prompt: Infrared photography, a forest path in deep magenta and white, trees glow ethereally, a deer stands perfectly still looking at camera, leaves are bright white against dark sky, heat signatures visible, otherworldly dreamlike quality, shot on modified Sony A7 with 720nm IR filter.

Microscope footage, extreme magnification of crystal formation in real time, minerals growing and branching in supersaturated solution, rainbow refractions through forming crystal lattice, scientific documentary style, dark field illumination, mesmerizing slow growth.

Shadow puppet theater, intricate Indonesian wayang kulit style, a battle between a dragon and a warrior, translucent leather puppets backlit by warm fire, ornate detail visible through the screen, gamelan percussion suggested by rhythmic movement, traditional shadow play.

Cyanotype print developing, blue and white photogram of botanical specimens, fern fronds and flowers appear as white silhouettes on deep Prussian blue, water washing over the print reveals the image, chemical process visible, Victorian science meets art.

Satellite timelapse from ISS, Earth at night slowly rotating below, city lights trace coastlines and rivers, aurora borealis dancing green over the poles, thin blue atmosphere line on the horizon, stars wheeling above, a thunderstorm flashes below like neurons firing. Real NASA footage aesthetic.
